# Kryptotrac-xx

Kryptotrac-xx is a modern crypto tracker platform built with TypeScript and Next.js. Its goal is to provide users with comprehensive tracking, analysis, and management of cryptocurrencies.

## Features

- Real-time tracking of cryptocurrency prices and performance
- Custom portfolio management
- Advanced analytics and charts
- Responsive, user-friendly interface

## Tech Stack

- **Framework:** [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/)
- **Language:** TypeScript
- **Frontend:** React, CSS ([styles/](./styles)), PostCSS
- **Package Manager:** pnpm
- **Other:** Custom components, scripts, and configurations

## Getting Started

### Prerequisites

- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/)
- [pnpm](https://pnpm.io/)

### Installation

\`\`\`bash
pnpm install
\`\`\`

### Running Locally

\`\`\`bash
pnpm dev
\`\`\`

Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) to view in your browser.

## Repository Structure

- `app/` - Main Next.js application entry point
- `components/` - React components used throughout the app
- `lib/` - Reusable helper functions and libraries
- `public/` - Static assets (images, icons, etc.)
- `scripts/` - Utility and automation scripts
- `styles/` - Global CSS and stylesheets
- `next.config.mjs` - Next.js configuration
- `postcss.config.mjs` - PostCSS configuration
- `package.json` - Project dependencies and scripts
- `pnpm-lock.yaml` - Lockfile for pnpm package management
- `tsconfig.json` - TypeScript configuration
- `components.json` - Component registry/config (custom to your app)

## Contribution

Pull requests and suggestions are welcome! Please open issues to suggest features or report bugs.
